DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate clinical efficacy Osseospeed™ TX 6 mm implant Chinese population evaluation marginal bone level alteration , implant stability implant survival posterior mandible maxilla 3 year load . The hypothesis one stage surgery use 6 mm OsseoSpeed™ TX implant posterior region safe predictable .
DOC.brief_title: Study OsseoSpeed™ TX Short Implants Chinese Population
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Provision inform consent 2 . Female male age 2075 year enrolment 3 . In need 23 implant either side posterior mandible maxilla ( premolar molar region ) 4 . History edentulism study area least four month 5 . Neighboring tooth/teeth plan bridge/crowns must natural root ( ) 6 . Presence natural teeth , partial prosthesis and/or implant opposite jaw contact plan bridge/crowns 7 . Deemed investigator suitable implant 6 mm length bone height least 6 mm bone width minimum 6 mm 8 . Deemed investigator likely present initially stable implant situation Exclusion criterion : 1 . Unlikely able comply study procedure , judge investigator 2 . Earlier graft procedure study area 3 . Uncontrolled pathologic process oral cavity 4 . Known suspected current malignancy 5 . History radiation therapy head neck region 6 . History chemotherapy within 5 year prior surgery 7 . Systemic local disease condition could compromise postoperative heal and/or osseointegration 8 . Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus 9 . Corticosteroids medication could influence postoperative healing and/or osseointegration 10 . Smoking 10 cigarettes/day 11 . Present alcohol and/or drug abuse 12 . Involvement plan conduct study ( applies Astra Tech staff staff study site ) 13 . Previous enrolment present study 14 . Simultaneous participation another clinical study , participation clinical study last 6 month 15 . Subjects unable give inform consent
